obtain.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to get something that you want, especially through your own effort, skill, or work
obtain.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Further information can be obtained from head office.
You will need to obtain permission from the principal.
the results obtained through these surveys
obtain.translation[0].definitions[0].not: In everyday English, people say that they get a result, a ticket, some information etc rather than obtain it:
You have to get permission from your parents.
obtain.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if a situation, system, or rule obtains, it continues to exist
